name: video-gen
description: Video Generation Studio - Complete video generation application with TTS, video rendering, and combined audio-video generation

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:tts"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../tts-service && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && echo 'Setup complete. Run "npm run dev" to start all services.'
